about.info:
Located on the famous Cliffs & beaches of Varkala, The Lost Hostels Varkala - Helipad offers a sea view with unique facilities in a relaxing and peaceful atmosphere. Throughout your stay we offer safe and clean facilities with OPEN KITCHEN, free Wi-Fi, en-suite bathrooms, common places to hang out and many more. We strive to ensure that our travelers get to stay with us as a part of the family. Travelers choose us because they like to meet new people, share their experiences & stories with each other and learn new culture while staying in the homely atmosphere but not for the facilities. Do not choose us if you rate a hostel based on its facilities rather than people and atmosphere. 
 
  *Great atmosphere & Vibe 
 
  *Cleanliness is very important for us 
 
  *Outdoor Sitting under coconut trees 
 
  *Occasional Barbecue and bonfire 
 
  *Board games ( Guess Who ? , Monopoly and others ) and daily activities 
 
  *WiFi in all property 
 
  *Guitar for our musician friends 
 
  *Communal Kitchen with all basic facilities 
 
  *Lockers - to protect everything thatâ€™s in your backpack 
 
  Your stay in Varkala should be one you will never forget, filled with laughter and both activities and time to relax and discover yourself. We believe in a strong community spirit and our hostel provides the facilities to make your stay truly amazing. Hang out in our backyard at campfires, cook dishes from all over the world in our open kitchen and help yourself with lots of books for reading, games to play and other activities to do. 
 
  Lost in India with us.

FAQs.question: Can you cook your own food at the hostel?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we have a communal kitchen area available for all of our guests to use. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to cook your own meals. We also provide basic cooking utensils and cutlery, so you can prepare your own meals at your convenience.

FAQs.question: Is it a good place to work from?
FAQs.answer: Absolutely! Lost Hostel Varkala is indeed a great place to work from, thanks to its popularity and relaxed atmosphere. The hostel provides various common areas that are conducive to work and productivity. The library is an excellent spot for quiet and focused work. It offers a peaceful environment where you can concentrate on your tasks while surrounded by books and a tranquil ambiance.

FAQs.question: Can i rent surf board from the hostel ?
FAQs.answer: No, we do not rent surf boards, but you can rent it from near the hostel.

FAQs.question: Are there any activities?
FAQs.answer: Welcome to Lost Hostel Varkala! We take great pleasure in organizing a variety of activities and events for our valued guests. Whether it's engaging nearby tours, entertaining game nights, or relaxing movie nights, we offer a range of options throughout the year. Participating in these activities is not only enjoyable but also a fantastic opportunity to connect with fellow travelers, forge new friendships, and delve into the wonders of Varkala.

FAQs.question: Does the Hostel have its own bar?
FAQs.answer: Apologies for the confusion. At Lost Hostel Varkala, we do not have an on-site bar. However, there are several nearby bars and establishments where guests can enjoy a variety of drinks and socialize. These establishments offer a range of options and atmospheres to suit different preferences.
